programme.title: New York Times mistake
programme.short_synopsis: Muddling a neutron for a neutrino, and the death of actor Clarence Muse.
programme.medium_synopsis: Mistaking a neutron for a neutrino, the New York Times has to apologise for its reporting of the Nobel Prize; and marking the death of Uncle Tom, actor Clarence Muse.
